reviewText: A $5.00 dollar collection is right, since this is what I paid for at Walmart.  A lot of low quality horror on most movies listed.  Some viewed as a vhs tape transfer.  Some gory one's such as, "The Greenkeeper", and "The Dead of Night", are your usual teen horror flicks. There are some scary creatures in some of the movies.  These movies are violent, gory, funny, scary, some more than others.Some familiar movies are included such as, "The Prophecy II", "Dracula III: Legacy",  and "Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers".  I wouldn't pay more than you have to for this set.  For twenty movies, $5.00 is a bargain at 25 cents a movie.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I ordered this DVD for one reason only; the film The House That Would Not Die.  A very good made-for-television film from 1970.  The story is that Barbara Stanwyck's character inherits and old revolutionary-period house that turns out to be haunted.  At times truly spooky, but thankfully not gory or unsettling, like more recent movies.  The quality of the DVD is extremely good.  I did not bother with any of the other films in this collection.  Recommended for this movie.
summary: 20-Film Horror: The House That Would Not Die
Title: N/A

reviewText: "The House That Would Not Die" was my reason for purchasing this DVD.After Watching some of the other movies this DVD really is a bargain.Very good entertainment.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I actually bought this DVD for one movie that was on it based on my favorite book of all time, "Amiee Come Home", by Barbara Michaels.  Of course the movie maker took liberties with the movie but it was close enough to the book that I loved it.  I did watch the others on the disc and they were actually better than just alright.  Often with this genre of movie you get buckets of blood and little else but not true with this one.  I would absolutely recommend it to anyone looking for movies in the horror genre.  T a little over $10.00 you can't go wrong.
summary: Good movies for a good price.
Title: N/A

reviewText: This isn't really a review. I just feel that Amazon doesn't give enough information about this DVD collection. I'm adding this so any potential buyer might to be able to make an informed purchasing decision. I hope it's useful.The Prophecy II (Video 1998) - 87 min - Fantasy / Horror / Thriller - Director: Greg Spence - Stars: Christopher Walken, Russell Wong and Jennifer Beals.Dracula III: Legacy (Video 2005) - 86 min - Horror - Director: Patrick Lussier - Stars: Jason Scott Lee, Stephen Billington and Diane Neal.The House That Would Not Die (1970) - TV Movie - 74 min - Horror - Director: John Llewellyn Moxey - Stars: Barbara Stanwyck, Richard Egan and Michael Anderson Jr.Seedpeople (1992) - 87 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Peter Manoogian - Stars: Sam Hennings, Andrea Roth and Dane Witherspoon.The Greenskeeper (2002) - 90 min - Comedy / Horror / Thriller - Directors: Kevin Greene, Adam Johnson & Tripp Norton - Stars: Allelon Ruggiero, Bruce Taylor and Ron Lester.Grim (1995) - 86 min - Horror - Director: Paul Matthews - Stars: Emmanuel Xuereb, Jack Chancer and Peter Tregloan.Evil Bong 3: The Wrath of Bong (2011) - Comedy / Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Charles Band - Stars: Amy Paffrath, Christina DeRosa and Robin Sydney.Deadly Instincts a.k.a. Breeders (1997) - 90 min - Horror / Sci-Fi - Director: Paul Matthews - Stars: Todd Jensen, Samantha Womack and Oliver Tobias.Evidence of a Haunting (2010) - 80 min - Drama / Fantasy / Horror - Director: Joey Evans - Stars: Jessica D. Fulling, Renee Wiggins and Scott Evans.7 Nights of Darkness (2011) - 90 min - Horror - Director: Allen Kellogg - Stars: Thomas Cassell, Jessica A. Fleming and Jennifer Hoffman.Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995) - 88 min - Horror / Thriller - Director: Joe Chappelle - Stars: Donald Pleasence, Paul Rudd and Marianne Hagan.Children of the Corn 666: Isaac's Return (Video 1999) - 82 min - Horror / Mystery / Thriller - Director: Kari Skogland - Stars: Natalie Ramsey, Gary Bullock and Alix Koromzay.The Dark (1993) - 87 min - Horror - Director: Craig Pryce - Stars: Stephen McHattie, Scott Wickware and Brion James.Lurking Fear (1994) - 76 min - Horror - Director: C. Courtney Joyner - Stars: Jon Finch, Blake Adams and Ashley Laurence.Hellraiser III: Hell on Earth (1992) - 91 min - Horror - Director: Anthony Hickox - Stars: Terry Farrell, Doug Bradley and Kevin Bernhardt.Sideshow (2000) - 90 min - Horror - Director: Fred Olen Ray - Stars: Jamie Martz, Michael Amos and Scott Clark.The Dead of Night (Video 2004) - 80 min - Horror - Directors: Tom Duncan & Serge Rodnunsky - Stars: Tom Brennan, Brian Crowe and Rich Finley.The Haunting of Fox Hollow Farm (2011) - 67 min - Documentary - Director: Dan T. Hall - Stars: Tracy Bacon, Myrna Cooke and Alex Hall.Shackled (2010) - 82 min - Horror / Thriller - Director: Dave McCabe - Stars: Andrew Blaikie, John Boylan and Donna Bradley.Head of the Family (1996) - 82 min - Comedy / Horror - Director: Charles Band - Stars: Blake Adams, Jacqueline Lovell and Bob Schott.Echo Bridge Home Entertainment, the company that produces this DVD, gives the following synopses for each film. I take no credit for writing them. I've just included them as a courtesy.THE PROPHECY IIWith the help of a mysterious stranger, an innocent woman races to protect her child from the powers of evil and save all of humanity.WES CRAVEN PRESENTS DRACULA III: LEGACYDracula leads vampire hunters Father Uffizi and Luke back to Eastern Europe where powerful warlords are assisting Dracula by capturing victims to feed to the vampires.THE HOUSE THAT WOULD NOT DIERuth and her niece, Sara, move into an old home with a dark past and are faced with strange occurrences of spirits and possession.SEED PEOPLEA geologist discovers that alien seeds are pollinating the citizens of Comet Valley and turning them into bad-tempered, blood-thirsty plants.THE GREENSKEEPERA lawn-mowing, throat-slitting greenskeeper takes out a group of snobby rich kids at a country club.GRIMAfter a series of mysterious disappearances, a team of cavers discovers the perpetrator--a grotesque, violent troll with a ginormous appetite.EVIL BONG 3: THE WRATH OF BONG!When Bachman smokes from an alien bong that crash lands on Earth, the old crew must team up to stop their friend and the planet from going up in smoke.DEADLY INSTINCTSAn alien monster crash-lands at an all-girls school and prowls the tunnels below campus capturing victims for breeding.EVIDENCE OF A HAUNTINGWhen the Supernatural Phenomena Research Society encounters its most difficult case yet in the tunnels below a community college, evil may finally overcome these ambitious investigators.7 NIGHTS OF DARKNESSSix reality TV contestants compete for a share of $1 million in a game that requires them to spend seven creepy nights in an abandoned asylum.HALLOWEEN: THE CURSE OF MICHAEL MYERSSix years after he was presumed dead in a fire, Michael Myers has returned to kill again--and this time there's no escape.CHILDREN OF THE CORN 666: ISAAC'S RETURNOn a trip to Gatlin, Nebraska, to find her birth mother, Hannah picks up a dark stranger who kicks off a mysterious chain of events.THE DARKIt feeds on the dead, waiting beneath the surface...tempting its victims into the dark. Now the two men who have witnessed the creature's wrath are determined to track it down.LURKING FEARAn ex-con goes searching for a dead body stuffed with his inheritance. But when he gets to the cemetery where the money is hidden, he must team up with a group of locals to stave off the blood-thirsty beasts that live below the surface.HELLRAISER III: HELL ON EARTHAn ambitious TV reporter discovers the Lament Configuration Box and now Pinhead walks the Earth again.SIDESHOWA group of teens visit the Horrors of Nature sideshow, where the freaks are real and so is the danger. When one of the girls becomes lost, the rest of the group searches the funhouse. But now that they're back inside, the freaks have another plan for them--a plan that will give them everything they've ever wished for...THE DEAD OF NIGHTGrotesque ghouls attack and take over a group of teens, transforming them into the same mindless creatures when night falls.THE HAUNTING OF FOX HOLLOW FARMOn the property where serial killer Herb Baumeister buried his victims, a group of paranormal experts investigate the haunting claims of lingering spirits.SHACKLEDAfter her brother is brutally murdered, Sarah uses the clues from her haunting dreams to lead her to the truth.HEAD OF THE FAMILYA pair of lovers look to a misshapen clan of human experiments to help carry out a murder. But when they push too far, the couple is at risk of becoming the next victims.
